short_summary: Procurement of 100 office chairs for DND
description: ADM(FIN) within DND has a requirement to procure 100 chairs for the Hybrid working environment that is currently being put in place.  ADM(FIN) requires the purchase 100 new office chairs in two different sizes, to be delivered and installed at NDHQ at 60 Moodie Drive in Ottawa, ON.

full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Office Seating: Rotary Chair

**Tender Reference Number:** cb-6839-48454132
**Contracting Entity:** National Defence
**Location:** Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

**Tender Details:**

* **Publication Date:** June 30, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** July 12, 2023 14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 28, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** September 30, 2023

**Procurement Information:**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Supply Requirements:**

* The National Defence requires procurement of 100 chairs for the Hybrid working environment, including two different sizes.
* The chairs are to be delivered and installed at 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON.

**Documents:**

* Tender Notice: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6839/w0152-24-aa008---npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6839/w0152-24-aa008---npp.pdf)
* Questions for W0152-24-AA008-Chairs: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6839/questions-for-w0152-24-aa008-chairs.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6839/questions-for-w0152-24-aa008-chairs.pdf)
* Questions 2 for W0152-24-AA008-Chairs: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6839/questions-2-for-w0152-24-aa008-chairs.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6839/questions-2-for-w0152-24-aa008-chairs.pdf)
